title: Pixel 3 screen stops responding to touch input after it shuts off.
content:
I've tried manually rebooting. Fixes the issue for a couple minutes before the whole cycle begins again. 

 I've tried a factory reset. Same problem. 

Screen is not cracked, broken, scratched, blemished in any way. Removed my screen protector. Nothing wrong with my fingers. Still have normal, human fingers. 

If I leave the phone plugged in to a power source it seems to solve the issue temporarily. 

Will test if something like USB-C headphones also works and update when I know.
